task.title: Validate Mbox Parameters
task.shortdesc: After you associate parameters with an mbox, you should validate them.

step.cmd: Mouse over Locations and click List.

stepresult.p: The parameters will be listed beside your mbox. Mbox-specific parameters are at the top of the list.

step.cmd: If the parameters do not appear, browse to the page with your mbox and refresh the page.

stepresult.p: Return to the List page and click refresh.

step.cmd: Click on the parameter label to see the last 10 values loaded.
